description: Individual driver and rider deep-dive analytics from Gold and Silver layers. Select an agent from the dropdowns to explore trip history, earnings, ratings, offers, activity breakdown, cancellations, and GPS trails. All data queried from Delta Lake via Trino.

panels.description: Profile details for the selected driver from dim_drivers (SCD Type 2, current record).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  first_name || ' ' || last_name AS name,
  vehicle_make || ' ' || vehicle_model || ' (' || CAST(vehicle_year AS VARCHAR) || ')' AS vehicle,
  license_plate,
  shift_preference,
  home_lat,
  home_lon
FROM delta.gold.dim_drivers
WHERE driver_id = '$driver_id'
  AND current_flag = TRUE

panels.title: Driver Profile

panels.description: Total number of trips associated with this driver.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS trips_completed
FROM delta.gold.fact_trips ft
JOIN delta.gold.dim_drivers dd ON ft.driver_key = dd.driver_key
WHERE dd.driver_id = '$driver_id'
  AND dd.current_flag = TRUE

panels.title: Trips Completed

panels.description: Sum of driver_payout from fact_payments for this driver.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(driver_payout), 0) AS total_earnings
FROM delta.gold.fact_payments fp
JOIN delta.gold.dim_drivers dd ON fp.driver_key = dd.driver_key
WHERE dd.driver_id = '$driver_id'
  AND dd.current_flag = TRUE

panels.title: Total Earnings

panels.description: Average rating received by this driver. Thresholds: red (<3.5), yellow (3.5-4.0), green (4.0+).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(AVG(CAST(rating AS DOUBLE)), 2) AS avg_rating
FROM delta.gold.fact_ratings fr
JOIN delta.gold.dim_drivers dd ON fr.ratee_key = dd.driver_key
WHERE dd.driver_id = '$driver_id'
  AND dd.current_flag = TRUE
  AND fr.ratee_type = 'driver'

panels.title: Avg Rating

panels.description: Average idle percentage from agg_daily_driver_performance. Idle = (online - en_route - on_trip) / online time.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(AVG(idle_pct), 1) AS idle_pct
FROM delta.gold.agg_daily_driver_performance adp
JOIN delta.gold.dim_drivers dd ON adp.driver_key = dd.driver_key
WHERE dd.driver_id = '$driver_id'
  AND dd.current_flag = TRUE

panels.title: Idle %

panels.description: Daily trips completed, total payout, and average rating from agg_daily_driver_performance. Payout on right axis (dashed).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CAST(dt.date_key AS TIMESTAMP) AS time,
  adp.trips_completed,
  adp.total_payout,
  adp.avg_rating
FROM delta.gold.agg_daily_driver_performance adp
JOIN delta.gold.dim_drivers dd ON adp.driver_key = dd.driver_key
JOIN delta.gold.dim_time dt ON adp.time_key = dt.time_key
WHERE dd.driver_id = '$driver_id'
  AND dd.current_flag = TRUE
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Daily KPI Trend

panels.description: Daily time breakdown by driver status: available, en route to pickup, and on trip. Stacked to show total online time composition.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CAST(dt.date_key AS TIMESTAMP) AS time,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fa.status = 'available' THEN fa.duration_minutes ELSE 0 END) AS available_minutes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fa.status = 'en_route_pickup' THEN fa.duration_minutes ELSE 0 END) AS en_route_minutes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fa.status = 'on_trip' THEN fa.duration_minutes ELSE 0 END) AS on_trip_minutes
FROM delta.gold.fact_driver_activity fa
JOIN delta.gold.dim_drivers dd ON fa.driver_key = dd.driver_key
JOIN delta.gold.dim_time dt ON fa.time_key = dt.time_key
WHERE dd.driver_id = '$driver_id'
  AND dd.current_flag = TRUE
GROUP BY dt.date_key
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Activity Breakdown

panels.description: Distribution of offer outcomes (accepted, rejected, expired) for this driver.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  outcome,
  COUNT(*) AS offer_count
FROM delta.gold.fact_offers
WHERE driver_id = '$driver_id'
GROUP BY outcome
ORDER BY offer_count DESC

panels.title: Offer Outcomes

panels.description: Average time in seconds for this driver to respond to offers.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(AVG(CAST(response_seconds AS DOUBLE)), 1) AS avg_response_seconds
FROM delta.gold.fact_offers
WHERE driver_id = '$driver_id'
  AND response_seconds IS NOT NULL

panels.title: Avg Response Time

panels.description: Daily average response time and offer count. Response time on left axis, count on right axis.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CAST(dt.date_key AS TIMESTAMP) AS time,
  AVG(CAST(fo.response_seconds AS DOUBLE)) AS avg_response_seconds,
  COUNT(*) AS offer_count
FROM delta.gold.fact_offers fo
JOIN delta.gold.dim_time dt ON fo.time_key = dt.time_key
WHERE fo.driver_id = '$driver_id'
GROUP BY dt.date_key
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Offer Response Over Time

panels.description: Distribution of ratings received by this driver (1-5 stars). Uses UNNEST to guarantee all buckets appear.

targets.rawSql:
WITH buckets AS (
  SELECT rating_val, rating_label
  FROM UNNEST(ARRAY[1,2,3,4,5],
              ARRAY['1 Star','2 Stars','3 Stars','4 Stars','5 Stars']) AS t(rating_val, rating_label)
),
rating_data AS (
  SELECT CAST(fr.rating AS INTEGER) AS rating_val, COUNT(*) AS rating_count
  FROM delta.gold.fact_ratings fr
  JOIN delta.gold.dim_drivers dd ON fr.ratee_key = dd.driver_key
  WHERE dd.driver_id = '$driver_id'
    AND dd.current_flag = TRUE
    AND fr.ratee_type = 'driver'
  GROUP BY CAST(fr.rating AS INTEGER)
)
SELECT b.rating_label AS rating, COALESCE(r.rating_count, 0) AS rating_count
FROM buckets b LEFT JOIN rating_data r ON b.rating_val = r.rating_val
ORDER BY b.rating_val

panels.title: Ratings Received (Distribution)

panels.description: Distribution of ratings given by this driver to riders. Shows how this driver rates others.

targets.rawSql:
WITH buckets AS (
  SELECT rating_val, rating_label
  FROM UNNEST(ARRAY[1,2,3,4,5],
              ARRAY['1 Star','2 Stars','3 Stars','4 Stars','5 Stars']) AS t(rating_val, rating_label)
),
rating_data AS (
  SELECT CAST(fr.rating AS INTEGER) AS rating_val, COUNT(*) AS rating_count
  FROM delta.gold.fact_ratings fr
  JOIN delta.gold.dim_drivers dd ON fr.rater_key = dd.driver_key
  WHERE dd.driver_id = '$driver_id'
    AND dd.current_flag = TRUE
    AND fr.rater_type = 'driver'
  GROUP BY CAST(fr.rating AS INTEGER)
)
SELECT b.rating_label AS rating, COALESCE(r.rating_count, 0) AS rating_count
FROM buckets b LEFT JOIN rating_data r ON b.rating_val = r.rating_val
ORDER BY b.rating_val

panels.title: Ratings Given (Distribution)

panels.description: Recent trips for this driver with rider name, zones, fare, surge, distance, and duration. Limited to 50 most recent.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ft.completed_at,
  dr.first_name || ' ' || dr.last_name AS rider_name,
  pz.name AS pickup_zone,
  dz.name AS dropoff_zone,
  ft.fare,
  ft.surge_multiplier AS surge,
  ROUND(ft.distance_km, 1) AS distance_km,
  ROUND(ft.duration_minutes, 0) AS duration_min
FROM delta.gold.fact_trips ft
JOIN delta.gold.dim_drivers dd ON ft.driver_key = dd.driver_key
JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON ft.rider_key = dr.rider_key
LEFT JOIN delta.gold.dim_zones pz ON ft.pickup_zone_key = pz.zone_key
LEFT JOIN delta.gold.dim_zones dz ON ft.dropoff_zone_key = dz.zone_key
WHERE dd.driver_id = '$driver_id'
  AND dd.current_flag = TRUE
ORDER BY ft.completed_at DESC
LIMIT 50

panels.title: Trip History

panels.description: Cancelled trips involving this driver with reason, stage, and associated rider.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  fc.cancelled_at,
  dr.first_name || ' ' || dr.last_name AS rider_name,
  fc.cancellation_reason,
  fc.cancellation_stage,
  fc.surge_multiplier AS surge
FROM delta.gold.fact_cancellations fc
JOIN delta.gold.dim_drivers dd ON fc.driver_key = dd.driver_key
LEFT JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON fc.rider_key = dr.rider_key
WHERE dd.driver_id = '$driver_id'
  AND dd.current_flag = TRUE
ORDER BY fc.cancelled_at DESC

panels.title: Cancellation Log

panels.description: GPS ping trail for this driver from the Silver layer. Marker size by speed, color by trip state. Centered on SÃ£o Paulo.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  latitude,
  longitude,
  speed,
  trip_state,
  timestamp
FROM delta.silver.stg_gps_pings
WHERE entity_type = 'driver'
  AND entity_id = '$driver_id'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1000

panels.title: GPS Trail

panels.description: Profile details for the selected rider from dim_riders.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  first_name || ' ' || last_name AS name,
  payment_method_type,
  behavior_factor,
  home_lat,
  home_lon
FROM delta.gold.dim_riders
WHERE rider_id = '$rider_id'

panels.title: Rider Profile

panels.description: Total number of trips for this rider.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS trips_completed
FROM delta.gold.fact_trips ft
JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON ft.rider_key = dr.rider_key
WHERE dr.rider_id = '$rider_id'

panels.title: Trips Completed

panels.description: Total amount spent by this rider from fact_payments.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(total_fare), 0) AS total_spent
FROM delta.gold.fact_payments fp
JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON fp.rider_key = dr.rider_key
WHERE dr.rider_id = '$rider_id'

panels.title: Total Spent

panels.description: Average rating received by this rider. Thresholds: red (<3.5), yellow (3.5-4.0), green (4.0+).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(AVG(CAST(rating AS DOUBLE)), 2) AS avg_rating
FROM delta.gold.fact_ratings fr
JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON fr.ratee_key = dr.rider_key
WHERE dr.rider_id = '$rider_id'
  AND fr.ratee_type = 'rider'

panels.title: Avg Rating Received

panels.description: Average wait time from request to match for this rider.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(AVG(date_diff('second', requested_at, matched_at)), 0) AS avg_wait_seconds
FROM delta.gold.fact_trips ft
JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON ft.rider_key = dr.rider_key
WHERE dr.rider_id = '$rider_id'
  AND ft.matched_at IS NOT NULL

panels.title: Avg Wait Time

panels.description: Daily total spending by this rider from fact_payments.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CAST(dt.date_key AS TIMESTAMP) AS time,
  SUM(fp.total_fare) AS daily_spending
FROM delta.gold.fact_payments fp
JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON fp.rider_key = dr.rider_key
JOIN delta.gold.dim_time dt ON fp.time_key = dt.time_key
WHERE dr.rider_id = '$rider_id'
GROUP BY dt.date_key
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Spending Over Time

panels.description: Individual rating events received by this rider over time. Each point is one rating.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  fr.rating_timestamp AS time,
  fr.rating
FROM delta.gold.fact_ratings fr
JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON fr.ratee_key = dr.rider_key
WHERE dr.rider_id = '$rider_id'
  AND fr.ratee_type = 'rider'
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Rating History

panels.description: Distribution of ratings received by this rider (1-5 stars).

targets.rawSql:
WITH buckets AS (
  SELECT rating_val, rating_label
  FROM UNNEST(ARRAY[1,2,3,4,5],
              ARRAY['1 Star','2 Stars','3 Stars','4 Stars','5 Stars']) AS t(rating_val, rating_label)
),
rating_data AS (
  SELECT CAST(fr.rating AS INTEGER) AS rating_val, COUNT(*) AS rating_count
  FROM delta.gold.fact_ratings fr
  JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON fr.ratee_key = dr.rider_key
  WHERE dr.rider_id = '$rider_id'
    AND fr.ratee_type = 'rider'
  GROUP BY CAST(fr.rating AS INTEGER)
)
SELECT b.rating_label AS rating, COALESCE(r.rating_count, 0) AS rating_count
FROM buckets b LEFT JOIN rating_data r ON b.rating_val = r.rating_val
ORDER BY b.rating_val

panels.title: Ratings Received (Distribution)

panels.description: Distribution of ratings given by this rider to drivers. Shows how this rider rates others.

targets.rawSql:
WITH buckets AS (
  SELECT rating_val, rating_label
  FROM UNNEST(ARRAY[1,2,3,4,5],
              ARRAY['1 Star','2 Stars','3 Stars','4 Stars','5 Stars']) AS t(rating_val, rating_label)
),
rating_data AS (
  SELECT CAST(fr.rating AS INTEGER) AS rating_val, COUNT(*) AS rating_count
  FROM delta.gold.fact_ratings fr
  JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON fr.rater_key = dr.rider_key
  WHERE dr.rider_id = '$rider_id'
    AND fr.rater_type = 'rider'
  GROUP BY CAST(fr.rating AS INTEGER)
)
SELECT b.rating_label AS rating, COALESCE(r.rating_count, 0) AS rating_count
FROM buckets b LEFT JOIN rating_data r ON b.rating_val = r.rating_val
ORDER BY b.rating_val

panels.title: Ratings Given (Distribution)

panels.description: Recent trips for this rider with driver name, zones, fare, surge, distance, and duration. Limited to 50 most recent.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ft.completed_at,
  dd.first_name || ' ' || dd.last_name AS driver_name,
  pz.name AS pickup_zone,
  dz.name AS dropoff_zone,
  ft.fare,
  ft.surge_multiplier AS surge,
  ROUND(ft.distance_km, 1) AS distance_km,
  ROUND(ft.duration_minutes, 0) AS duration_min
FROM delta.gold.fact_trips ft
JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON ft.rider_key = dr.rider_key
JOIN delta.gold.dim_drivers dd ON ft.driver_key = dd.driver_key
LEFT JOIN delta.gold.dim_zones pz ON ft.pickup_zone_key = pz.zone_key
LEFT JOIN delta.gold.dim_zones dz ON ft.dropoff_zone_key = dz.zone_key
WHERE dr.rider_id = '$rider_id'
ORDER BY ft.completed_at DESC
LIMIT 50

panels.title: Trip History

panels.description: Distribution of cancellation reasons for this rider.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  cancellation_reason,
  COUNT(*) AS cancellation_count
FROM delta.gold.fact_cancellations fc
JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON fc.rider_key = dr.rider_key
WHERE dr.rider_id = '$rider_id'
GROUP BY cancellation_reason
ORDER BY cancellation_count DESC

panels.title: Cancellation Reasons

panels.description: Percentage of this rider's trips that had surge pricing (multiplier > 1.0).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ROUND(
    100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN ft.surge_multiplier > 1.0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0),
    1
  ) AS surge_trip_pct
FROM delta.gold.fact_trips ft
JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON ft.rider_key = dr.rider_key
WHERE dr.rider_id = '$rider_id'

panels.title: Surge Exposure %

panels.description: Distribution of surge multiplier ranges across this rider's trips.

targets.rawSql:
WITH buckets AS (
  SELECT range_name, range_order
  FROM UNNEST(ARRAY['1.0x (none)','1.0-1.5x','1.5-2.0x','2.0x+'],
              ARRAY[1,2,3,4]) AS t(range_name, range_order)
),
surge_data AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN ft.surge_multiplier <= 1.0 THEN '1.0x (none)'
      WHEN ft.surge_multiplier <= 1.5 THEN '1.0-1.5x'
      WHEN ft.surge_multiplier <= 2.0 THEN '1.5-2.0x'
      ELSE '2.0x+'
    END AS surge_bucket,
    COUNT(*) AS trip_count
  FROM delta.gold.fact_trips ft
  JOIN delta.gold.dim_riders dr ON ft.rider_key = dr.rider_key
  WHERE dr.rider_id = '$rider_id'
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT b.range_name AS surge_range, COALESCE(s.trip_count, 0) AS trip_count
FROM buckets b LEFT JOIN surge_data s ON b.range_name = s.surge_bucket
ORDER BY b.range_order

panels.title: Surge Distribution

panels.description: GPS ping trail for this rider from the Silver layer. Marker size by speed, color by trip state. Centered on SÃ£o Paulo.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  latitude,
  longitude,
  speed,
  trip_state,
  timestamp
FROM delta.silver.stg_gps_pings
WHERE entity_type = 'rider'
  AND entity_id = '$rider_id'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1000

panels.title: GPS Trail

list.definition: SELECT driver_id AS __value, first_name || ' ' || last_name || ' (' || driver_id || ')' AS __text FROM delta.gold.dim_drivers WHERE current_flag = TRUE ORDER BY first_name
list.label: Driver
list.name: driver_id
list.query: SELECT driver_id AS __value, first_name || ' ' || last_name || ' (' || driver_id || ')' AS __text FROM delta.gold.dim_drivers WHERE current_flag = TRUE ORDER BY first_name

list.definition: SELECT rider_id AS __value, first_name || ' ' || last_name || ' (' || rider_id || ')' AS __text FROM delta.gold.dim_riders ORDER BY first_name
list.label: Rider
list.name: rider_id
list.query: SELECT rider_id AS __value, first_name || ' ' || last_name || ' (' || rider_id || ')' AS __text FROM delta.gold.dim_riders ORDER BY first_name

title: Agent Explorer
